column2: Cost of data breaches increasing to average of $3.8 mln
column3: study says May 27 The cost of data breaches is rising for companies around the world as sophisticated thieves target valuable financial and medical records
column4: according to a study released on Wednesday.

column2: Strong dollar hits Tiffany's quarterly salesDIARY-U.S. MEETINGS/WEEK AHEADUS STOCKS-Wall St set to open higherUS STOCKS-Wall St opens higher
column3: rebounding from steep selloff a day earlierUS STOCKS-Wall St bounces back from Tuesday selloff as dollar easesUS STOCKS-Wall St rises as Greece worries abateUPDATE 3-Tiffany's sales
column4: profit beat on higher tourist spending in EuropeTiffany's sales
